ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.utils
Class CoordConversion

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ru.yandex.yandexmapkit.utils.CoordConversion
public final class CoordConversion
extends java.lang.Object

CoordConversion.java: Coordinates conversion. Converts pixel coordinates calculated at zoom level 23 into geographical coordinates and back.

This file is a part of the Yandex Map Kit.
